bibdata.title: IEEE Standard Requirements for Pad-Mounted Fused Switchgear
IEEE Standard Requirements for Pad-Mounted Fused Switchgear

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Requirements for assemblies of single-phase and three-phase, dead-front and live-front,pad-mounted, load-interrupter switches with expulsion, current-limiting, and other types of fuses in enclosures up to 38 kV rated maximum voltage are given. Definitions are given, and service conditions and ratings are discussed. Design tests, production tests, and construction requirements are included.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
